get.description:
Generates a stock chart for a given symbol and exchange.

This endpoint will fetch stock data for the specified symbol from the given exchange, and generate a chart based on the specified parameters. The chart can be customized with various options such as interval, chart type, and appearance settings.

The resulting chart is returned as an HTML image element embedded with the base64-encoded chart image.

parameters.name: symbol

schema.description: Stock symbol to fetch data for
schema.title: Symbol

parameters.description: Stock symbol to fetch data for

parameters.name: interval

schema.description: Time interval for the stock data
schema.title: Interval

parameters.description: Time interval for the stock data

parameters.name: outputsize

schema.description: Number of data points to return
schema.title: Outputsize

parameters.description: Number of data points to return

parameters.name: volume

schema.description: Whether to include volume in the chart
schema.title: Volume

parameters.description: Whether to include volume in the chart

parameters.name: dark_mode

schema.description: Whether to use dark mode for the chart
schema.title: Dark Mode

parameters.description: Whether to use dark mode for the chart

parameters.name: dpi

schema.description: Dots per inch for the chart image
schema.title: Dpi

parameters.description: Dots per inch for the chart image

parameters.name: grid

schema.description: Whether to display grid on the chart
schema.title: Grid

parameters.description: Whether to display grid on the chart
